scripts.dev: concurrently "pnpm run dev --filter @twin-games/shared" "pnpm run dev --filter @twin-games/backend" "pnpm run dev --filter @twin-games/frontend"
scripts.build: concurrently "pnpm run build --filter @twin-games/shared" "pnpm run build --filter @twin-games/backend" "pnpm run build --filter @twin-games/frontend"
scripts.typecheck: concurrently "pnpm run typecheck --filter @twin-games/shared" "pnpm run typecheck --filter @twin-games/backend" "pnpm run typecheck --filter @twin-games/frontend"
